summary: Veterans Affairs relies on critical IT systems to manage benefits and provide care to millions of veterans and their families. We testified about VA's efforts to modernize and manage its IT. For example, after 3 unsuccessful attempts to modernize its health information system, the department is trying again. We also reported that VA's IT contracts were not always properly approved. title: Veterans Affairs: Action Needed to Address Continuing IT Management Challenges
